judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Motion to quash granted. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Manderino dissents.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: John M. McAllister, with him McAlKster and Beif, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Ryan v. Ryan, Appellant.
Argued November 9, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
John M. McAllister, with him McAlKster and Beif, for appellant.
Chester T. Cyzio, for appellee.
November 17, 1972:
